tool_description: An API showing all the news related to the change in  environment and climate all around the world
name: Environmental Change Live
title: Environmental Change Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Climate Change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://environmental-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "environmental-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://environmental-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "environmental-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: this end point will return back all news about climate change all over the world.
